Articles.Content:
The Robodyne Control Moment Gyroscope provides three-axis torque in response to command inputs for rotational control of the spacecraft. The amount of torque added is equivalent to a manned cockpit. Some electrical power is consumed by the gyro.

Install as many CMGs as desired. Extremely massive spacecraft may benefit from multiple gyros.

Download: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/control-moment-gyroscope-4/

I am not an artist and, yes, it's using the old abandoned original ASAS model/textures. I think it's a reasonable fit for this, considering what a real CMG looks like. However, since Squad owns the art assets, please do not redistribute this part anywhere that Squad does not control.

Feedback is welcome!
I always thought the SAS part would have this function and i was very disappointed when i heard that it didn't. Thank you for this part
Likewise, just downloaded and I think it will be very useful. Thanks!
